text: @GovRonDeSantis @EducationFL It's time to stop being trumps puppet and do something about the devastating spikes florida is experiencing from covid19 ? It's time to go back to stage 1 before you destroy the state. Cancel the Republican convention in Jacksonville.  I'm a Republican who's had enough.
